# ^ as if they had been listed in the manifest's custom_types field.
# ^ 'BaseStats' and 'Point2D' are moved here from the manifest so that the manifest
# ^ keeps only scalar / constraint-based custom types.  At least one custom type

BaseStats
description:text: Named record alias for creature combat stats (attack / defense / speed)

name:name: Point2D
description:text: Named tuple alias for a 2-D coordinate (x, y)

name:name: FlexStats
description:text: Extended stats record with an optional critical-hit rate (nil = not applicable)
